===Etymology 1===

====Pronunciation====

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|にっき}}

# a record of events and facts
# a record of daily events or thoughts; a [[diary]] or [[journal]]<ref>{{R:Shogakukan}}</ref>

====See also====

===Etymology 2===
Originally, there was no means to write the geminate consonant, so it was left out. Pronunciation was likely [nikki] rather than [niki].<ref>{{R:Kojien}}</ref>

====Noun====

# a record of events and facts
# a record of daily events or thoughts; a [[diary]] or [[journal]]
